entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries or rain showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries or rain showers ending early this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain near noon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High 9.
